Header: Hermes fashion show hints at brand’s saddlery history
Content: To music by Frederic Sanchez, luxury fashion house Hermes presented their Spring 2020 collection at Paris Fashion Week. Models could be seen in jackets, and capes that hinted at the company’s tradition of saddlery and the aprons the craftsman would wear. Designed by the company’s creative director Nadège Vanhee-Cybulski, models could be seen walking in cream and tan hues with entire segments of black or brown. Paris Fashion Week, the last leg of the fashion shows around the world.
